message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Can you meet me halfway?
Hi Bob, I understand your offer of $8000, but I'm not quite ready to accept that yet. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get a bit more out of the deal. How about we compromise at $9000?
I'm still not comfortable with the price at $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $8500. Can you consider that?

Hi Bob, I understand your latest offer of $8500, but I'm still not getting the value I'm looking for. I'm willing to compromise a bit more, but I need to get closer to my target. How about we meet at $8800?
I'm still not comfortable with the price at $8800. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $8200. Can you consider that?
